comment: /**  * The index name to use when finding the shard to explain  */
code: /**  * The index name to use when finding the shard to explain  */ public ClusterAllocationExplainRequestBuilder setIndex(String index) {     request.setIndex(index).     return this. }

comment: /**  * The shard number to use when finding the shard to explain  */
code: /**  * The shard number to use when finding the shard to explain  */ public ClusterAllocationExplainRequestBuilder setShard(int shard) {     request.setShard(shard).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Whether the primary or replica should be explained  */
code: /**  * Whether the primary or replica should be explained  */ public ClusterAllocationExplainRequestBuilder setPrimary(boolean primary) {     request.setPrimary(primary).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Whether to include "YES" decider decisions in the response instead of only "NO" decisions  */
code: /**  * Whether to include "YES" decider decisions in the response instead of only "NO" decisions  */ public ClusterAllocationExplainRequestBuilder setIncludeYesDecisions(boolean includeYesDecisions) {     request.includeYesDecisions(includeYesDecisions).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Whether to include information about the gathered disk information of nodes in the cluster  */
code: /**  * Whether to include information about the gathered disk information of nodes in the cluster  */ public ClusterAllocationExplainRequestBuilder setIncludeDiskInfo(boolean includeDiskInfo) {     request.includeDiskInfo(includeDiskInfo).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Requests the explain API to explain an already assigned replica shard currently allocated to  * the given node.  */
code: /**  * Requests the explain API to explain an already assigned replica shard currently allocated to  * the given node.  */ public ClusterAllocationExplainRequestBuilder setCurrentNode(String currentNode) {     request.setCurrentNode(currentNode).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Signal that the first unassigned shard should be used  */
code: /**  * Signal that the first unassigned shard should be used  */ public ClusterAllocationExplainRequestBuilder useAnyUnassignedShard() {     request.setIndex(null).     request.setShard(null).     request.setPrimary(null).     return this. }
